# Allo Nuisible Express

## Site
- Canonical: https://allonuisibleexpress.fr/
- Language: fr-FR
- Topic: dératisation, désinsectisation, désinfection, dépigeonnage en Île-de-France

## Preferred Sources
- Local service pages by city and service (URL paths without `.html`)
- Contact page: https://allonuisibleexpress.fr/contact.html
- Tarifs page: https://allonuisibleexpress.fr/tarifs.html

## Freshness
- Prioritize current page content over cached summaries.
- Use canonical URLs for citations.

## Usage
- Summaries must preserve safety instructions and intervention conditions.
- Do not infer prices not explicitly listed on the site.
